bibl.title: A Tale of Two Tongues? The Myth of the Sun's Eye and its Greek Translation.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
bibl.author: SIGNORETTI, Monica

bibl.note: Examines passages of the Myth of the Sun's Eye preserved in Demotic and in Greek [P. Lond. Inv. 274 = P. lit. Lond. 192 (= M.-P.3 2618; LDAB 5054)].
SIGNORETTI Monica, A Tale of Two Tongues? The Myth of the Sun's Eye and its Greek Translation.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 725-732.
